Html:
Hi, it's almost impossible to get any help for the club starter kit, but i try.

I really hope someone can help me with this



My site is almost finnished, but i find out that when i register a new member and go to update details, i get a message that the details have been updated sucessfully, but when i go back in to check, everything is away. I check in the db to, and there is nothing there..



What can be the reason for this?



My second problem is when user go to forum and acess Thread.aspx then i get this error:  (actually the only thing you can do in the forum is to look at the topics.

Server Error in '/' Application.
The INSERT statement conflicted with the FOREIGN KEY constraint "FK_MembersThreads_MemberInfo". The conflict occurred in database "kbsdesi_clubDB", table "dbo.MemberInfo", column 'memberid'.
The statement has been terminated.

I see now in the database that memberInfo is empty. What can be the reason for this? It looks like it's because of that i have problems with the forum

Can it be something with that thos host is medium trust?

Really hope that somebody can help me with this.



Regards Kenneth
